questions: Can you provide an overview of your experience in the Software Development industry?
How have you stayed current with industry trends and advancements during your 1.5-year employment gap?
Can you discuss the specific personal reasons that led to your employment gap?
What motivated you to return to the workforce after your time away due to personal reasons?
How do you ensure that your skills and knowledge in software development remain up-to-date and relevant?
Can you share a project or achievement from your previous work experience that you are particularly proud of?
How do you approach problem-solving and troubleshooting in a software development context?
Have you had experience working in a team-oriented environment? If so, how do you contribute to team success?
How do you handle challenging deadlines and high-pressure situations in your work?
Can you explain how your experience and skills align with the specific requirements of the role you are applying for?
